entry.title: AI gamers benefit from reading the instruction manual first

link.title: AI gamers benefit from reading the instruction manual first

entry.summary: Researchers find AI programs learn thousands of times faster compared to brute-force trial and error methods.

entry.title: AI masters video game 6000 times faster by reading the instructions

link.title: AI masters video game 6000 times faster by reading the instructions

entry.summary: An artificial intelligence has learned to master an Atari skiing game in days of playing time rather than the decades it took a specialist DeepMind AI, simply by reading the instructions written for humans before it started

entry.title: An AI Learned to Play Atari 6,000 Times Faster by Reading the Instructions

link.title: An AI Learned to Play Atari 6,000 Times Faster by Reading the Instructions

entry.summary: By combining language model training with a reinforcement learning algorithm, a team at Carnegie Mellon University has taught an AI to improve its gaming ability by reading manuals.
